meanings.definition: A type of whiskey distilled from corn mash.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping bourbons with friends on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying different bourbons to find my favorite.
meanings.sent3: At the whiskey tasting, I accidentally spilled bourbons on my shirt!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of bourbons filled the room, transporting me to a distillery.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of bourbons lingered on my palate long after the glass was empty.

meanings.definition: A member of a French royal family.
meanings.sent1: The history book mentioned the Bourbons as a prominent royal lineage.
meanings.sent2: The Bourbons resided in opulent palaces throughout France.
meanings.sent3: During the masquerade ball, I dressed up as a Bourbon for fun!
meanings.sent4: The elegance and grace of the Bourbons were legendary in French history.
meanings.sent5: The portrait gallery showcased the regal portraits of the Bourbons through the centuries.

meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cookie.
meanings.sent1: I bought a pack of bourbons from the store for a sweet treat.
meanings.sent2: During tea time, I like to dunk bourbons in my cup of tea.
meanings.sent3: My favorite childhood memory is baking bourbons with my grandma.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked bourbons filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy texture of bourbons paired perfectly with a glass of milk.
